Library.description: Core services for manufacturing applications on BVR platform
Library.name: Mbc0SoaMfgBvrCore

Library.description: Infrastructure model and services for manufacturing applications on BVR

ParameterInfo.description: The object for which the report is needed and the requested report type

Operation.description:
This operation generates a report file for the given object.
The report is generated in serveral steps:
- Data is exported in PLMXML format using a pre-configured transfer mode
- The PLMXML is converted to .html file using a configurable xslt file
- The .html is then converted to a .pdf file using fop tool (should be installed at the server side machine by the customer)
The parameters for the report are configured in a preference named Mbc0Report. Each entry in the preference should have the following format:

For now the operation supports only PDF reports.
Operation.exceptionCondition: an error will be given if for some reason the system failed to generate the report
Operation.name: generateReport

ParameterInfo.description: The object for which the report is needed and the requested report type

ParameterInfo.description: A list of objects for which the operation should return the relevant variant options. The objects passed to this parameter are expected to be of type ImanItemBOPLine

Operation.description:
This operation returns the variant option relevant for a given ImanItemBOPLine, and the returned options are the ones attached to the top level line for that structure.
This operation supports only legacy variants.
Operation.name: getOptions
Operation.returnDescription: This operation returns a struct containing the relevant options and their values for each input object.
Operation.useCase:
User wants to set a variant condition on operation line. For that, the application will call the GetOptions operation to get the relevant options for that operation line.
The service operation will find the operation line's root Plant BOP and will get the variant options from that Plant BOP. These options will then be used in the variant condition.

ParameterInfo.description: Required data changes, in XML format

A map between the client ID (client generated string that is used in the response to correlate the input object and the result object) and a business object that needs to be updated.
The input business objects to this operation are expected to be of type ImanItemBOPLine or Mbc0OperatorAction.

Operation.description: This operation receives a given set of data changes that happened in an application, and runs the proper actions to persist them in bulk. All data is saved to the database by the end of the operation.
Operation.name: saveData

ServiceInterface.description: This service includes APIs to replace core APIs which are written as ICT or as stateful SOA calls. Such core APIs cannot be used in web applications, and require stateless replacement.

ServiceInterface.description: Reports service provides all operations needed for report generation.
ServiceInterface.name: Reports
